00028 static inline VALUE string2RSTRING(const XString &str) {
00029     if(str.empty()) return rb_str_new2("");
00030     return rb_str_new2(str.c_str());
00031 }
00032 
00033 XRuby::XRuby(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XMeasure> &measure)
00034 : XAliasListNode<XRubyThread>(name, runtime),
00035 m_measure(measure), 
00036 m_thread(shared_from_this(), &XRuby::execute)
00037 {
00038     m_lsnCreateChild = m_tlkCreateChild.connectWeak(shared_from_this(),
00039         &XRuby::onCreateChild, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00040 }
00041 XRuby::~XRuby()
00042 {
00043 }
00044 void
00045 XRuby::rnode_free(void *rnode)
00046 {
00047     struct rnode_ptr* st = reinterpret_cast<struct rnode_ptr*>(rnode);
00048     delete st;
00049 }
00050 
00051 VALUE
00052 XRuby::rnode_create(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node, XRuby *xruby)
00053 {
00054 
00055     struct rnode_ptr *st
00056     = new rnode_ptr;
00057 
00058     st->ptr = node;
00059     st->xruby = xruby;
00060     VALUE rnew;
00061     shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> vnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(node);
00062     if(vnode)
00063     {
00064         rnew = Data_Wrap_Struct(xruby->rbClassValueNode, 0, rnode_free, st);
00065     }
00066     else
00067     {
00068         shared_ptr<XListNodeBase> lnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XListNodeBase>(node);
00069         if(lnode)
00070         {
00071             rnew = Data_Wrap_Struct(xruby->rbClassListNode, 0, rnode_free, st);
00072         }
00073         else
00074         {
00075             rnew = Data_Wrap_Struct(xruby->rbClassNode, 0, rnode_free, st);
00076         }
00077     }
00078     return rnew;
00079 }
00080 VALUE
00081 XRuby::rnode_child(VALUE self, VALUE var)
00082 {
00083     char errmsg[256];
00084     try {
00085         shared_ptr<XNode> child;
00086         struct rnode_ptr *st;
00087         Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00088 
00089         if(shared_ptr<XNode> node = st->ptr.lock()) {
00090             switch (TYPE(var)) {
00091             int idx;
00092             case T_FIXNUM:
00093                 idx = NUM2INT(var);
00094                 { atomic_shared_ptr<const NodeList> list = node->children();
00095                 if(list) { 
00096                     if ((idx >= 0) && (idx < (int)list->size()))
00097                         child = list->at(idx);
00098                 }
00099                 }
00100                 if(! child ) {
00101                     throw formatString("No such node idx:%d on %s\n",
00102                         idx, node->getName().c_str());
00103                 }
00104                 break;
00105             case T_STRING:
00106             {
00107                 const char *name = RSTRING(var)->ptr;
00108                 child = node->getChild(name);
00109                 if(! child ) {
00110                     throw formatString("No such node name:%s on %s\n",
00111                         name, node->getName().c_str());
00112                 }
00113             }
00114             break;
00115             default:
00116                 throw formatString("Ill format to find node on %s\n", node->getName().c_str());
00117             }
00118         }
00119         else {
00120             throw XString("Node no longer exists\n");
00121         }
00122         return rnode_create(child, st->xruby );
00123     }
00124     catch (XString &s) {
00125         snprintf(errmsg, 256, "%s", s.c_str());
00126     }
00127     rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "%s", errmsg);
00128     return Qnil;  
00129 }
00130 VALUE
00131 XRuby::rlistnode_create_child(VALUE self, VALUE rbtype, VALUE rbname)
00132 {
00133     Check_Type(rbtype, T_STRING);
00134     if(TYPE(rbtype) != T_STRING) return Qnil;
00135     Check_Type(rbname, T_STRING);
00136     if(TYPE(rbname) != T_STRING) return Qnil;
00137     char *type = RSTRING(rbtype)->ptr;
00138     char *name = RSTRING(rbname)->ptr;
00139 
00140     char errmsg[256];
00141     try {
00142         shared_ptr<XNode> child;
00143         struct rnode_ptr *st;
00144         Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00145         if(shared_ptr<XNode> node = st->ptr.lock()) {
00146             if( node->isRunTime() )
00147             {
00148                 throw formatString("Node %s is run-time node!\n", node->getName().c_str());
00149             }     
00150             shared_ptr<XListNodeBase> lnode =
00151                 dynamic_pointer_cast<XListNodeBase>(node);
00152             if(!lnode)
00153             {
00154                 throw formatString("Error on %s : Not ListNode. Could not make child"
00155                     " name = %s, type = %s\n", node->getName().c_str(), name, type);
00156             }
00157             if(strlen(name))
00158                 child = node->getChild(name);
00159             /*
00160           if(type != child->getTypename()) {
00161               rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "Different type of child exists on %s\n",
00162                  (const char*)node->getName().utf8());
00163               return Qnil;
00164           }
00165              */
00166             if(!child) {
00167                 shared_ptr<tCreateChild> x(new tCreateChild);
00168                 x->lnode = lnode;
00169                 x->type = type;
00170                 x->name = name;
00171                 st->xruby->m_tlkCreateChild.talk(x);
00172                 XScopedLock<XCondition> lock(x->cond);
00173                 while(x->lnode) {
00174                     x->cond.wait();
00175                 }
00176                 child = x->child;
00177                 x->child.reset();
00178             }
00179             if(!child) {
00180                 throw formatString(
00181                     "Error on %s : Could not make child"
00182                     " name = %s, type = %s\n", node->getName().c_str(), name, type);
00183             }
00184         }
00185         else {
00186             throw XString("Node no longer exists\n");
00187         }
00188         return rnode_create(child, st->xruby );
00189     }
00190     catch (XString &s) {
00191         snprintf(errmsg, 256, "%s", s.c_str());
00192     }
00193     rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "%s", errmsg);
00194     return Qnil;  
00195 }
00196 void
00197 XRuby::onCreateChild(const shared_ptr<tCreateChild> &x) 
00198 {
00199     x->child = x->lnode->createByTypename(x->type, x->name);
00200     x->lnode.reset();
00201     XScopedLock<XCondition> lock(x->cond);
00202     x->cond.signal();
00203 }
00204 VALUE
00205 XRuby::rlistnode_release_child(VALUE self, VALUE rbchild)
00206 {
00207     struct rnode_ptr *st;
00208     Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00209     char errmsg[256];
00210     try {
00211         if(shared_ptr<XNode> node = st->ptr.lock()) {
00212             if(!node->isUIEnabled() )
00213             {
00214                 throw formatString("Node %s is read-only!\n", node->getName().c_str());
00215             }     
00216             shared_ptr<XListNodeBase> lnode =
00217                 dynamic_pointer_cast<XListNodeBase>(node);
00218             if(!lnode)
00219             {
00220                 throw formatString("Error on %s : Not ListNode. Could not release child\n"
00221                     , node->getName().c_str());
00222             }
00223             struct rnode_ptr *st_child;
00224             Data_Get_Struct(rbchild, struct rnode_ptr, st_child);
00225             if(shared_ptr<XNode> child = st_child->ptr.lock()) {
00226                 lnode->releaseChild(child);
00227                 return Qnil;  
00228             }
00229             else {
00230                 throw XString("Node no longer exists\n");
00231             }
00232         }
00233         else {
00234             throw XString("Node no longer exists\n");
00235         }
00236         return self;
00237     }
00238     catch (XString &s) {
00239         snprintf(errmsg, 256, "%s", s.c_str());
00240     }
00241     rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "%s", errmsg);
00242     return Qnil;  
00243 }
00244 
00245 VALUE
00246 XRuby::rnode_name(VALUE self)
00247 {
00248     struct rnode_ptr *st;
00249     Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00250     char errmsg[256];
00251     try {
00252         if(shared_ptr<XNode> node = st->ptr.lock()) {
00253             return string2RSTRING(node->getName());
00254         }
00255         else {
00256             throw XString("Node no longer exists\n");
00257         }
00258     }
00259     catch (XString &s) {
00260         snprintf(errmsg, 256, "%s", s.c_str());
00261     }
00262     rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "%s", errmsg);
00263     return Qnil;  
00264 }
00265 VALUE
00266 XRuby::rnode_count(VALUE self)
00267 {
00268     struct rnode_ptr *st;
00269     Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00270     char errmsg[256];
00271     try {
00272         if(shared_ptr<XNode> node = st->ptr.lock()) {
00273             atomic_shared_ptr<const NodeList> list = node->children();
00274             VALUE count = INT2NUM(list ? list->size() : 0);
00275             return count;
00276         }
00277         else {
00278             throw XString("Node no longer exists\n");
00279         }
00280     }
00281     catch (XString &s) {
00282         snprintf(errmsg, 256, "%s", s.c_str());
00283     }
00284     rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "%s", errmsg);
00285     return Qnil;  
00286 }
00287 VALUE
00288 XRuby::rnode_touch(VALUE self)
00289 {
00290     struct rnode_ptr *st;
00291     Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00292     char errmsg[256];
00293     try {
00294         if(shared_ptr<XNode> node = st->ptr.lock()) {
00295             dbgPrint(QString("Ruby, Node %1, touching."));
00296             if(node->isUIEnabled() )
00297                 node->touch();
00298             else
00299                 throw formatString("Node %s is read-only!\n", node->getName().c_str());
00300             return Qnil;  
00301         }
00302         else {
00303             throw XString("Node no longer exists\n");
00304         }
00305     }
00306     catch (XString &s) {
00307         snprintf(errmsg, 256, "%s", s.c_str());
00308     }
00309     rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "%s", errmsg);
00310     return Qnil;  
00311 }
00312 VALUE
00313 XRuby::rvaluenode_set(VALUE self, VALUE var)
00314 {
00315     struct rnode_ptr *st;
00316     Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00317     char errmsg[256];
00318     try {
00319         if(shared_ptr<XNode> node = st->ptr.lock()) {
00320             shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> vnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(node);
00321             ASSERT(vnode);
00322             dbgPrint(QString("Ruby, Node %1, setting new value.").arg(node->getName()) );
00323             if(!node->isUIEnabled() )
00324             {
00325                 throw formatString("Node %s is read-only!\n", node->getName().c_str());
00326             }
00327             if(XRuby::strOnNode(vnode, var))
00328             {
00329                 return Qnil;
00330             }
00331             else
00332             {
00333                 dbgPrint(QString("Ruby, Node %1, new value: %2.").arg(node->getName()).arg(vnode->to_str()) );
00334                 return XRuby::getValueOfNode(vnode);
00335             }
00336         }
00337         else {
00338             throw XString("Node no longer exists\n");
00339         }
00340     }
00341     catch (XString &s) {
00342         snprintf(errmsg, 256, "%s", s.c_str());
00343     }
00344     rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "%s", errmsg);
00345     return Qnil;  
00346 }
00347 VALUE
00348 XRuby::rvaluenode_load(VALUE self, VALUE var)
00349 {
00350     char errmsg[256];
00351     struct rnode_ptr *st;
00352     Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00353     try {
00354         if(shared_ptr<XNode> node = st->ptr.lock()) {
00355             shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> vnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(node);
00356             ASSERT(vnode);
00357             dbgPrint(QString("Ruby, Node %1, loading new value.").arg(node->getName()) );
00358             if( node->isRunTime() )
00359             {
00360                 throw formatString("Node %s is run-time node!\n", node->getName().c_str());
00361             }
00362             if(XRuby::strOnNode(vnode, var))
00363             {
00364                 return Qnil;
00365             }
00366             else
00367             {
00368                 dbgPrint(QString("Ruby, Node %1, new value: %2.").arg(node->getName()).arg(vnode->to_str()) );
00369                 return XRuby::getValueOfNode(vnode);
00370             }
00371         }
00372         else {
00373             throw XString("Node no longer exists\n");
00374         }
00375     }
00376     catch (XString &s) {
00377         snprintf(errmsg, 256, "%s", s.c_str());
00378     }
00379     rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "%s", errmsg);
00380     return Qnil;  
00381 
00382 }
00383 VALUE
00384 XRuby::rvaluenode_get(VALUE self)
00385 {
00386     struct rnode_ptr *st;
00387     Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00388     char errmsg[256];
00389     try {
00390         if(shared_ptr<XNode> node = st->ptr.lock()) {
00391             shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> vnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(node);
00392             ASSERT(vnode);
00393             return XRuby::getValueOfNode(vnode);
00394         }
00395         else {
00396             throw XString("Node no longer exists\n");
00397         }
00398     }
00399     catch (XString &s) {
00400         snprintf(errmsg, 256, "%s", s.c_str());
00401     }
00402     rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "%s", errmsg);
00403     return Qnil;  
00404 }
00405 VALUE
00406 XRuby::rvaluenode_to_str(VALUE self)
00407 {
00408     struct rnode_ptr *st;
00409     Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00410     char errmsg[256];
00411     try {
00412         if(shared_ptr<XNode> node = st->ptr.lock()) {
00413             shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> vnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(node);
00414             ASSERT(vnode);
00415             return string2RSTRING(vnode->to_str());
00416         }
00417         else {
00418             throw XString("Node no longer exists\n");
00419         }
00420     }
00421     catch (XString &s) {
00422         snprintf(errmsg, 256, "%s", s.c_str());
00423     }
00424     rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "%s", errmsg);
00425     return Qnil;  
00426 }
00427 
00428 int
00429 XRuby::strOnNode(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node, VALUE value)
00430 {
00431     double dbl = 0;
00432     int integer = 0;
00433 
00434     shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> dnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XDoubleNode>(node);
00435     shared_ptr<XIntNode> inode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XIntNode>(node);
00436     shared_ptr<XUIntNode> uinode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XUIntNode>(node);
00437     shared_ptr<XBoolNode> bnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XBoolNode>(node);
00438 
00439     switch (TYPE(value)) {
00440     case T_FIXNUM:
00441         integer = NUM2INT(value);
00442         if(uinode) {
00443             if(integer >= 0) {
00444                 uinode->value(integer); return 0;
00445             }
00446             else {
00447                 throw formatString("Negative FIXNUM on %s\n", node->getName().c_str());
00448             }
00449         }
00450         if(inode) {
00451             inode->value(integer); return 0;
00452         }
00453         dbl = integer;
00454         if(dnode) {dnode->value(dbl); return 0;}
00455         throw formatString("FIXNUM is not appropreate on %s\n"
00456             , node->getName().c_str());
00457     case T_FLOAT:
00458         dbl = RFLOAT(value)->value;
00459         if(dnode) {dnode->value(dbl); return 0;}
00460         throw formatString("FLOAT is not appropreate on %s\n"
00461             , node->getName().c_str());
00462     case T_BIGNUM:
00463         dbl = NUM2DBL(value);
00464         if(dnode) {dnode->value(dbl); return 0;}
00465         throw formatString("BIGNUM is not appropreate on %s\n"
00466             , node->getName().c_str());
00467         //    integer = lrint(dbl);
00468         //    if(inode && (dbl <= INT_MAX)) {inode->value(integer); return 0;}
00469     case T_STRING:
00470         try {
00471             node->str(XString(RSTRING(value)->ptr));
00472         }
00473         catch (XKameError &e) {
00474             throw formatString("Validation error %s on %s\n"
00475                 , (const char*)e.msg().c_str(), node->getName().c_str());
00476         }
00477         return 0;
00478     case T_TRUE:
00479         if(bnode) {bnode->value(true); return 0;}
00480         throw formatString("TRUE is not appropreate on %s\n"
00481             , node->getName().c_str());
00482     case T_FALSE:
00483         if(bnode) {bnode->value(false); return 0;}
00484         throw formatString("FALSE is not appropreate on %s\n"
00485             , node->getName().c_str());
00486     default:
00487         throw formatString("UNKNOWN TYPE is not appropreate on %s\n"
00488             , node->getName().c_str());
00489     }
00490     return -1;
00491 }
00492 VALUE
00493 XRuby::getValueOfNode(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node)
00494 {
00495     shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> dnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XDoubleNode>(node);
00496     shared_ptr<XIntNode> inode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XIntNode>(node);
00497     shared_ptr<XUIntNode> uinode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XUIntNode>(node);
00498     shared_ptr<XBoolNode> bnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XBoolNode>(node);
00499     shared_ptr<XStringNode> snode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XStringNode>(node);
00500     if(dnode) {return rb_float_new((double)*dnode);}
00501     if(inode) {return INT2NUM(*inode);}
00502     if(uinode) {return UINT2NUM(*uinode);}
00503     if(bnode) {return (*bnode) ? Qtrue : Qfalse;}
00504     if(snode) {return string2RSTRING(*snode);}
00505     return Qnil;
00506 }
00507 
00508 shared_ptr<XRubyThread>
00509 XRuby::findRubyThread(VALUE self, VALUE threadid)
00510 {
00511     int id = NUM2INT(threadid);
00512     struct rnode_ptr *st;
00513     Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00514     shared_ptr<XRubyThread> rubythread;
00515     atomic_shared_ptr<const NodeList> list = st->xruby->children();
00516     if(list) { 
00517         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < list->size(); i++) {
00518             shared_ptr<XRubyThread> th = dynamic_pointer_cast<XRubyThread>(list->at(i));
00519             ASSERT(th);
00520             if(id == *th->threadID())
00521                 rubythread = th;
00522         }
00523     }
00524     return rubythread;
00525 }
00526 VALUE
00527 XRuby::my_rbdefout(VALUE self, VALUE str, VALUE threadid)
00528 {
00529     shared_ptr<XString> sstr(new XString(RSTRING(str)->ptr));
00530     shared_ptr<XRubyThread> rubythread(findRubyThread(self, threadid));
00531     if(rubythread) {
00532         rubythread->onMessageOut().talk(sstr);
00533         dbgPrint(QString("Ruby [%1]; %2").arg(rubythread->filename()->to_str()).arg(*sstr));
00534     }
00535     else {
00536         dbgPrint(QString("Ruby [global]; %1").arg(*sstr));
00537     }
00538     return Qnil;
00539 }
00540 VALUE
00541 XRuby::my_rbdefin(VALUE self, VALUE threadid)
00542 {
00543     shared_ptr<XRubyThread> rubythread(findRubyThread(self, threadid));
00544     char errmsg[256];
00545     try {
00546         if(rubythread) {
00547             XString line = rubythread->gets();
00548             if(line.length())
00549                 return string2RSTRING(line);
00550             return Qnil;  
00551         }
00552         else {
00553             throw XString("UNKNOWN Ruby thread\n");
00554         }
00555     }
00556     catch (XString &s) {
00557         snprintf(errmsg, 256, "%s", s.c_str());
00558     }
00559     rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "%s", errmsg);
00560     return Qnil;  
00561 }
00562 VALUE
00563 XRuby::is_main_terminated(VALUE self)
00564 {
00565     struct rnode_ptr *st;
00566     Data_Get_Struct(self, struct rnode_ptr, st);
00567     return (st->xruby->m_thread.isTerminated()) ? Qtrue : Qfalse;
00568 }
00569 
00570 void *
00571 XRuby::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00572 {
00573 
00574     while (!terminated) {
00575         ruby_init();
00576         ruby_script("KAME");
00577 
00578         ruby_init_loadpath();
00579 
00580         rbClassNode = rb_define_class("XNode", rb_cObject);
00581         rb_global_variable(&rbClassNode);
00582         typedef VALUE(*fp)(...);
00583         rb_define_method(rbClassNode, "name", (fp)rnode_name, 0);
00584         rb_define_method(rbClassNode, "touch", (fp)rnode_touch, 0);
00585         rb_define_method(rbClassNode, "child", (fp)rnode_child, 1);
00586         //      rb_define_method(rbClassNode, "[]", (fp)rnode_child, 1);
00587         rb_define_method(rbClassNode, "count", (fp)rnode_count, 0);
00588         rbClassValueNode = rb_define_class("XValueNode", rbClassNode);
00589         rb_global_variable(&rbClassValueNode);
00590         rb_define_method(rbClassValueNode, "internal_set", (fp)rvaluenode_set, 1);
00591         rb_define_method(rbClassValueNode, "internal_load", (fp)rvaluenode_load, 1);
00592         rb_define_method(rbClassValueNode, "internal_get", (fp)rvaluenode_get, 0);
00593         rb_define_method(rbClassValueNode, "to_str", (fp)rvaluenode_to_str, 0);
00594         rbClassListNode = rb_define_class("XListNode", rbClassNode);
00595         rb_global_variable(&rbClassListNode);
00596         rb_define_method(rbClassListNode, "internal_create", (fp)rlistnode_create_child, 2);
00597         rb_define_method(rbClassListNode, "release", (fp)rlistnode_release_child, 1);
00598 
00599         {
00600             shared_ptr<XMeasure> measure = m_measure.lock();
00601             ASSERT(measure);
00602             XString name = measure->getName();
00603             name[0] = toupper(name[0]);
00604             VALUE rbRootNode = rnode_create(measure, this);
00605             rb_define_global_const(name.c_str(), rbRootNode);
00606             rb_define_global_const("RootNode", rbRootNode);
00607         }
00608         {
00609             VALUE rbRubyThreads = rnode_create(shared_from_this(), this);
00610             rb_define_singleton_method(rbRubyThreads, "my_rbdefout", (fp)my_rbdefout, 2);
00611             rb_define_singleton_method(rbRubyThreads, "my_rbdefin", (fp)my_rbdefin, 1);
00612             rb_define_singleton_method(rbRubyThreads, "is_main_terminated", (fp)is_main_terminated, 0);
00613             rb_define_global_const("XRubyThreads", rbRubyThreads);
00614         }
00615 
00616         {
00617             int state;
00618             QString filename = KStandardDirs::locate("appdata", XRUBYSUPPORT_RB);
00619             if(filename.isEmpty()) {
00620                 g_statusPrinter->printError("No KAME ruby support file installed.");
00621             }
00622             else {
00623                 rb_load_protect (string2RSTRING(filename), 0, &state);
00624             }
00625         }
00626         ruby_finalize();
00627 
00628         fprintf(stderr, "ruby finished\n");
00629 
00630     }
00631     return NULL;
00632 }
